item.title: Visual Exploration Buttons
item.author: info@infomous.com
item.description: To save real estate and benefit from broad adoption, embed one of our customizable Visual Exploration Buttons throughout your web site. Readers will quickly adopt the pop-up Visual Exploration cloud as their favorite way to navigate your content - without getting lost in the structure of your site.

item.title: The Time Machine
item.author: info@infomous.com
item.description: Give your reader access to archival stories to increase the yield and shelf life of your editorial. Readers will love using the Time Machine to re-live stories from last year, or simply to catch up on what happened during the past week.

item.title: The Advertiser Display This is line 2 ★
item.author: info@infomous.com
item.description: This module lets advertisers showcase content in many formats (video, images, text, social media, ...) through a single, visually compelling Infomous cloud. Your advertisers will love the amount of time readers spend exploring their content with the Advertiser Display!

item.title: The Classifieds Explorer
item.author: info@infomous.com
item.description: Browsing classified ads has never been so much fun... or so easy! Show your readers the most recent job offerings, or make the Classifieds Explorer a fully interactive page where readers can fine-tune their search, whether they are looking for the next job or the house of their dreams.
